General.Name: Happy Creek Minerals Ltd
General.Description: Happy Creek Minerals Ltd. engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. It primarily explores for copper, molybdenum, tungsten, gold, and silver deposits. The company owns interest in the Highland Valley property, which consists of the Rateria property and the West Valley property located in south central British Columbia. It also holds interests in the Silverboss, Hen-Art-DL, Fox, Black Riders, and Hawk properties; and the Silver Dollar Property. The company was incorporated in 2004 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 789 West Pender Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 1H2
